textUnit.notReleasedTooltip: Text only visible to teaching assistants and instructors. Release date:
textUnit.markdownHelp: You can enter Markdown here. More information:
textUnit.cachedMarkdown: Artemis found some unsaved markdown in the local storage. Do you want to load it? Save Date:

createTextUnit.title: Create Text Unit
createTextUnit.name: Name
createTextUnit.namePlaceHolder: Give the text unit a name
createTextUnit.nameMaxLengthValidationError: Name can be max 255 characters long.

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the text unit {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the text unit for confirmation.

videoUnit.notReleasedTooltip: Video only visible to teaching assistants and instructors. Release date:

createVideoUnit.title: Create Video Unit
createVideoUnit.name: Name
createVideoUnit.namePlaceHolder: Give the video unit a name
createVideoUnit.nameMaxLengthValidationError: Name can be max 255 characters long.
createVideoUnit.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: Description can be max 1000 characters long.
createVideoUnit.sourcePlaceHolder: Enter an URL to an embeddable video
createVideoUnit.urlHelperPlaceholder: You can enter a Video URL here and use the arrow to create the correct embeddable URL from it
createVideoUnit.urlHelperValidationError: Automatic embed link generation is not possible for this URL

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the video unit {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the video unit for confirmation.

attachmentUnit.notReleasedTooltip: Attachment only visible to teaching assistants and instructors. Release date:

createAttachmentUnit.title: Create Attachment Unit
createAttachmentUnit.name: Name
createAttachmentUnit.updateNotificationTextPlaceholder: Optional notification text for students about changes.
createAttachmentUnit.updateNotificationTextMaxLengthValidatio: The notification text can be max 1000 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.nameMaxLengthValidationError: Name can be max 255 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: Description can be max 1000 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.fileRequiredValidationError: You must select a file to upload.
createAttachmentUnit.fileLimitations: Supported Types: ".png", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".svg", ".pdf", ".zip". Max. file size 10 mb

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the attachment unit {{ title }}? The attachment will also be removed! You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the attachment for confirmation.

createExerciseUnit.headline: Connect an Exercise with the Lecture
createExerciseUnit.description: Select all the Exercises to connect with the Lecture.

delete.question: Do you really want to unlink the exercise {{ title }}? The exercise will be kept! You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the exercise for confirmation.
